description: In this tutorial, we show how to calculate and visualize the electronic band gap using our Web Interface, for the simple case of crystalline silicon.
title: Exabyte.io Tutorial: Calculate Electronic Band Gap

youTubeCaptions.text: Create a simulation job by navigating to the job designer page.
Next, open workflow tab, and select Band Gap workflow.
Next, navigate to compute tab, and set compute configuration.
Next, set the name for the job, and save it. In this case, we call the job, Silicon Band Gap Calculation.
Next, save the job. Afterwards, the job can be selected and submitted to the compute queue, in order to be executed.
The status of the job will accordingly change, from submitted, to active.
Following the end of job execution, open the job to inspect the final results.
After reviewing the preliminary information displayed on top, the final result for the band gap can be found towards the bottom of the results page.
